job.name: Pileup
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setenv NODEBUG yes # setenv STARFPE NO # starver .DEV2 set base = `basename ${INPUTFILE0} .fz`; set s = `echo ${base} | awk -F_ '{print $2}'` set logFile = ${base}.log if (! -r pileup.list) then # ls ../pp510B/*.fz | egrep -v '(pythia_0144)' > pileup.list # ls ../pp510B/*.fz > pileup.list ls ../AuAu200pileupBL3/*.fz > pileup.list endif echo "${logFile}" if ( -r ${logFile}) exit 0; starsim -w 0 -G 500 -b $STAR/kumacs/merge input=${INPUTFILE0} pileup=pileup.list set=${s} > ${logFile}
